name: MasuRii
title: Full Stack Developer & Creative Technologist
bio: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer and Creative Technologist specialized in building high-performance, accessible, and visually stunning web experiences. My journey in tech started with a curiosity for how things work under the hood, which evolved into a career dedicated to crafting seamless digital products.

With deep expertise in React, Astro, and modern animation libraries like Motion, I bridge the gap between complex engineering and intuitive design. I believe that performance and accessibility are not just 'features' but fundamental pillars of a successful web application.

When I'm not coding, I'm usually exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or experimenting with creative coding and 3D graphics to push the boundaries of what's possible on the web.
shortBio: Building high-performance, accessible, and visually stunning web experiences with modern technology.
